phases.heading: Exploring Volcanoes
phases.body: Let's learn about Volcanoes. This topic touches our everyday lives in ways we might not notice. From the moment we wake up until we go to sleep, Volcanoes play a role in our world.

items.text: Volcanoes are like nature's fireworks, where hot lava and ash burst out from deep inside the Earth!
Did you know that Calbuco Volcano in Chile erupted for the first time in over 40 years? That's a long nap for a sleeping giant!
There are different types of volcanoes, each with its own personality—some are gentle giants, while others are fierce and explosive!
